#!/bin/bash
# run_chat.sh - Full RAG workflow after chat ingestion

set -e

# === Load configuration ===
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
CONFIG_FILE="${SCRIPT_DIR}/../config.sh"

if [ ! -f "$CONFIG_FILE" ]; then
  echo "❌ config.sh not found at: $CONFIG_FILE"
  exit 1
fi

source "$CONFIG_FILE"
